snippet: The two-time reigning discus world champion Robert Harting of Germany added the European Championships title, beating the Olympic gold medalist Gerd Kanter of Estonia.
lead_paragraph: The two-time reigning discus world champion Robert Harting of Germany added the European Championships title, beating the Olympic gold medalist Gerd Kanter of Estonia.

headline.seo: Two-Time Discus World Champ Wins European Tournament
headline.main: Two-Time Discus World Champ Wins European Tournament
